amendment.description: To appropriate an additional $350,000,000 to improve the security at points of entry into the United States.

action.text: Amendment SA 3655 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3655 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 49. Record Vote Number: 182.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3655 made in Senate.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3655.

Amendment SA 3655 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S9205-9206, S9207-9208; text: CR S9205) To appropriate an additional $350,000,000 to improve the security at points of entry into the United States.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3655 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 49. Record Vote Number: 182.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3655 proposed by Senator Schumer.
